caption: Ever-higher single-core performance demands and aging limitations of maximum voltage in 3nm-plus mobile ﬂagship smartphone CPU.
The DMPA of the CPU with BDC/ATC block diagram and architecture in 3nm-plus SoC.
The CPU performance boost with CPP efﬁciency and design margin optimization to achieve higher OPP0+.
The proposed Boosting-Duty Control (BDC) with a digital A-sensor to leverage available aging-budget in CPU.
The digital T-sensor with proposed Differential-Voltage-based Temperature Compensation (DVTC) achieving fast and accurate temperature sensing in silicon for the CPU.
The Dynamic Mobile-Performance Augmentation (DMPA) contains the ATC and BDC for the CPU with silicon measurement results.
The 3nm-plus CPU die-photo with DMPA feature summary and on-phone benchmark demonstration.
